original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁na na bhāvanā ya ▁pahātabb aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na na bhāvanā ya ▁pahātabb o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi

original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁nabhāvanāya ▁pahātabb añca ▁na na bhāvanā ya ▁pahātabb añca ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nabhāvanāya ▁pahātabb o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
